events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me at all and I have not worn it yet.
The customer's request involves a refund for an unwanted product that does not fit.
Assigning agent Sarah M. to handle the refund case for the customer requesting money back on a recent jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m Sarah, and I’ll assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has any damage or if it is still in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 7823459. The jacket is in perfect condition and still has all the tags attached; it has never been worn.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate your refund once you ship the jacket back to us. I will email you the prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick help. I appreciate you sending the return label.
We have sent the prepaid return shipping label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to confirm if you have received the return label and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
The jacket return was confirmed, and your refund has been processed successfully. We are closing this case now. Please contact us if you need anything else.
